answers.answer: Don't even say you want to transfer. Just go to the schedule an appointment with the new Dr, and stop going to the other one.

Do what bree said, unless you are pretty far along. I say 20 weeks or less just go to a diff doc. If farther than that then I would deft transfer so they can get your records so you don't have to do multiple blood works and diabetes testing again.
Completely agree with her above. If you are further long it's so much work if you didn't tansfer your records. Other then that under 20 weeks, just stop going.
Thanks (: I'll call another doctor you helped alot

question: So I have a contract with my doctor I have insurance and have to pay $82 everytime I go but I don't like how I'm bein treated so do I just call another clinic and tell them I want to transfer to them or how would this be done?
title: how to switch doctors help!!!!
